name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (tactic)
description:
Tic Tac Toe

Tac Tac Toe is a game for two players, X and O, who take turns marking a cell in a 3x3 grid. The first player to mark a horizontal, vertical or diagonal line of three cells wins.

Device requirements:

  • Any screen size
    • Landscape / portrait
    • Fullscreen or windowed
  • Any input device
    • Touch
    • Mouse + left click
    • D-pad controller + B-button (or use Gopher360)
    • Keyboard with arrow keys + spacebar

Credits: Sounds NoiseForFun.com, Medal icons Pixabay.com.
